description: Far-right activists broke away from a large protest in Berlin against coronavirus restrictions.
title: Germany coronavirus: Anger after attempt to storm parliament
title_page: Germany coronavirus: Anger after attempt to storm parliament - BBC News
maintext: "Those angered by our coronavirus measures or who doubt their necessity can do so openly, in protests. But my tolerance ends when protesters hitch themselves to the wagon of enemies of democracy and political rabble-rousers."
